author: SkinnyTaste
name: Egg White Muffins with Turkey Bacon, Cottage Cheese, and Veggies

ingredients.ingred_name: medium orange or red bell pepper

instructions: Preheat the oven to 350F. Spray a nonstick 12 cup muffin tin VERY generously with oil so the eggs don't stick.  Sautéed the shallots, scallions and bell pepper in oil over medium-low heat, cook until tender, 5 to 6 minutes. Add the broccoli and cook 1 more minute. Meanwhile, in a large bowl combine the egg whites, cottage cheese, garlic powder and seasoning salt. Add the veggies and mix. Using 12 cup muffin tin, line each cup with a half slice turkey bacon around the edges and pour in the egg mixture, about 1/3 cup each. Top with the shredded cheese and bake in the center of the oven about 25 minutes, until set.
